703386f-a.text:
Broadway, at the East River, showing the toll house, vehicular entrance, slip and ferry of the Municipal Ferry to 23rd Street (Manhattan). This set, consisting of three views was taken at the same time. The bridge shown in No. 3 is the Queensboro.
March 24, 1931.
P.L. Sperr
703386f-a.folder: Bushwick Avenue & Metropolitan Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
